document_data.name: Chimera-spawn
document_data.mainbody: '''Chimera-spawn''' were mutant [[chimera]]s, known only in the [[Stonelands]].
document_data.Description: These mutant chimeras were covered in serpent-scales and had a single central lion's head, flanked with two dragon heads.
document_data.Personality: Per eyewitnesses, chimera-spawn were recklessly aggressive.
document_data.Abilities: One of the chimera-spawn's heads breathed fire, and the other one breathed electricity. They were otherwise rather similar to existing chimeras, with only a few differences.
document_data.Combat: Besides its twin breath weapons, the chimera-spawn's serpentine draconic scales covered its whole body, making it that much tougher and giving it far fewer weak spots. The creature was also slightly hardier than a regular chimera.
document_data.Ecology: [[Chimera]]e of the [[Stonelands]] sometimes gave birth to chimera-spawn when both sire and mare were chimerae. The resulting mutants lived generally short lives, as they were too aggressive for their own good.
document_data.History: Per the adventuring [[wizard]] [[Maris Khorna Terrabin]], these creatures were found only in the Stonelands. She'd only ever seen one personally, and it was dead after it accidentally collapsed a cave on itself during a fight.
